text: "Dead Ringer for Love" is a 1981 song by Meat Loaf featuring Cher. It was the leading single from his second studio album Dead Ringer. It went to number 2 in Ireland, number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 16 in Sweden, number 17 in Spain, number 39 in the Netherlands and number 65 in Australia. It was included on Meat Loaf's album Hits out of Hell and Cher's 1992 greatest hits album Greatest Hits: 1965â€“1992. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Meat Loaf songs Category:Cher songs Category:Heartland rock songs
title: Dead Ringer for Love
